target_markets.market_description: Technical and somewhat technical people who understand modern tools and automation concepts
pain_points: lack of technical skills for implementation
target_markets.market_size_indicators: Potential for billion dollar company if they follow Shopify's promotion model

target_markets.market_description: Non-technical people struggling with AI automation tools
target_markets.market_size_indicators: Described as 'vast majority of people' - large underserved market

problems_validated.problem: Non-technical users can't effectively implement AI automation workflows
problems_validated.severity: High - tools become 'basically useless' for this segment
problems_validated.current_solutions: Copying workflows from others, manual setup
problems_validated.market_gap: Workflows break and users don't know how to fix them

problems_validated.problem: People don't want to spend time creating workflows manually

products_tools.name: n8n
products_tools.sentiment: mixed - underrated for technical users, overrated for non-technical
products_tools.metrics: compared to new drop shipping in terms of hype

products_tools.metrics: cash earning from same day treasury product

business_strategies.strategy: Add affiliate programs to AI automation tools
business_strategies.implementation: Follow Shopify's model of promoting through affiliates
business_strategies.expected_results: Could make 'so much money' and become billion dollar company
business_strategies.case_study: Shopify's success with affiliate marketing for drop shipping

business_strategies.strategy: Use AI tools like Cursor to develop profitable SaaS products
business_strategies.case_study: Current AI development tools making this possible

problems_solutions.problem: Non-technical people struggle with AI automation tools
problems_solutions.solution: Use template-based tools like Lindy.ai instead of building from scratch

startup_ideas.idea: SaaS product built using AI development tools
startup_ideas.validation: Use tools like Cursor to rapidly prototype and test
startup_ideas.investment_needed: Minimal - mainly time and tool subscriptions

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Assuming AI automation tools work for everyone regardless of technical skill
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Tools become useless for non-technical users, workflows break
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Assess technical capability before choosing tools, start with template-based solutions
mistakes_to_avoid.example: People copying n8n workflows that don't work for them

growth_tactics.tactic: Create tutorials and educational content about AI tools
growth_tactics.results_expected: Audience building and potential affiliate revenue

steps: Describe desired workflow in natural language
